name: Aloy
desc: Formerly an outcast, now a hunter of unparalleled skill. Ready to do the right thing at any time.

textualResearch.title: 2025 - [Casella di posta speciale] - Da quanto tempo...

desc.text:
Devo ammettere che gli incarichi della Gilda degli avventurieri non mi soddisfano più. Certo, di tanto in tanto mi capita ancora di adare la caccia ai mostri, ma... Mettiamola così, desidero un'avventura più stimolante!
Ed è per questo motivo che sono venuta a Natlan.
Tribù, cacce, mostri, Saurici e una terra selvaggia e incontaminata piena di segreti che attende solo di essere scoperta... È tutto ciò che ho sempre sognato!
Sono particolarmente affezionata alla tribù di Huitztlan e ho chiesto ai suoi membri di insegnarmi alcuni dei loro trucchi per l'arrampicata. Dovresti proprio vedermi in azione mentre mi dondolo tra le rupi.
Oh, ti ho mandato anche alcuni bottini dai miei viaggi. Ho pensato che potessero tornarti utili.
Come ti dico sempre, non esitare a chiamarmi se dovessi incappare in qualche problema. Verrò in tuo aiuto in qualsiasi momento.

Outcast, hunter of machines, Seeker, Anointed, Savior... Aloy had many identities in her original world, and she was destined on account of her genetics to be the heroine who would heal it.
Now, she has arrived in a new world, full of never-before-seen challenges, and once again, she throws herself gladly into the hunt.

Aloy was born an outcast, deeply rejected and feared by her tribe. She was raised in the rugged mountains near their tribal dwellings by the experienced Hunter, Rost.
He taught her how to hunt: to have cat-like form and deadly accuracy. And yet, he could not pass the most important thing onto her — the truth of her birth. Who were her parents? Why had she been cast out?
Unfortunately, the reasons for this were known only to the very High Matriarchs of the tribe who had exiled her.

There was only one way to discover the identity of Aloy's parents — victory at the Proving, the tribe's annual hunting contest, in which the victor would be free to ask for a reward.
She would train hard all her life for that event, but when the moment of trial came, the ritual would end in tragedy.
Mysterious assassins slew the participating Hunters, and it was only through Rost's sacrifice that Aloy was able to escape.
Later, Aloy would learn that she was the true target of the attack, for she had almost exactly the same face as an enigmatic, ancient woman.

Aloy knew that she had to find these killers to understand her origins.
Her pursuit brought her into a wild and dangerous world far beyond her imagination, bringing strange and powerful tribes, mysterious ancient ruins, and terrifying enemies — whether human or machine — before her.
In the end, the true enemy, HADES, appeared before her. It was an artificial intelligence filled with malice, bent on cleansing the world of all life.
There was only one way to defeat HADES: investigate her link with that ancient woman, that "Aloy from the past"... Or could she have been her mother?

Hot on HADES' trail, Aloy traversed a great many ruins from the distant past, and ultimately discovered her origin: she was not born of human flesh and blood but was the result of cloning.
The genetics of the woman who had saved all life 1,000 years ago had been the basis for her creation.
This had not only granted her the abilities she had possessed since birth, but had also guided her destiny, for this genetic material was the key to preventing the second coming of the apocalypse.
Armed with this knowledge, and with the help of allies from many tribes, Aloy was finally able to defeat HADES and its human and machine minions in a decisive battle in the shining city of Meridian.

After defeating HADES, Aloy embarked on a new journey, pursuing ancient technologies and cleansing the land that HADES had trampled underfoot.
In her long journey, she found every Old World Ruin that there was to be found in search of the Old Ones' lost secrets.
In one ancient, dilapidated laboratory, she found something she had never seen before — a gleaming portal. As she drew close, she was enveloped by powerful energies, and she saw her own image within the portal as one looking into a mirror, feeling as if she were in two places at once.
With a flash of light, the "world" that Aloy knew completely disappeared from her sight, and she now found herself in a strange, beautiful new world just waiting to be explored.

imgDesc.text:
Original Outfit - Machine Hunter
Aloy's outfit. A hunter's garb suited to life in the wilds.

voice.title: Hello
voice.desc: Aloy here. I don't know this world, but my arrows are sharp and my bow's ready. If your party needs help, I'll do what I can.

voice.title: Chat: Moving Out
voice.desc: Come on. Enough standing around, let's keep moving.

voice.title: Chat: Help
voice.desc: Let's get going. There are people who need our help.

voice.title: When It Rains
voice.desc: Rain. One way to wash off the grime.

voice.title: After the Rain
voice.desc: Sky's running out of rain for now. Time to dry off.

voice.title: When It Snows
voice.desc: The world always seems quieter when it snows.

voice.title: When It's Windy
voice.desc: Wind's kicking up again. Feels good to breathe it in.

voice.title: When the Wind Is Blowing
voice.desc: Wind is really whipping now. My face feels raw.

voice.title: Good Morning
voice.desc: Morning. World's starting to stir again. Me too, I guess.

voice.title: Good Afternoon
voice.desc: Day's half over, but we still have a lot to do.

voice.title: Good Evening
voice.desc: Sunset. We'll be under the stars soon.

voice.title: Good Night
voice.desc: Night's here. Time to rest, unless we're going on by starlight.

voice.title: About Aloy
voice.desc: I grew up an outcast, and it wasn't much fun. Even though I'm a stranger here, people are friendlier than the tribe that was supposed to raise me. It's... nice.

voice.title: About Us: Action
voice.desc: Everything I do is in the service of life, not death. That's why I'm here with you.

voice.title: About Us: Oath
voice.desc: An oath seems like a formality. But if you want mine, you've got it.

voice.title: About Us: Moving Forward
voice.desc: I'll do whatever it takes to finish this with you. I won't hesitate. I won't falter.

voice.title: Something to Share
voice.desc: If I have to share something, it'll be my bow... in the service of people who need the help.

voice.title: Interesting Things
voice.desc: This land has a past full of secrets, just like my world. I'll uncover all of it, if I have enough time.

voice.title: More About Aloy: I
voice.desc: I'm not much for talking about myself. The mission is what's important.

voice.title: More About Aloy: II
voice.desc: I never had parents. But a man named Rost raised me. He was stern, but kind and generous. And he trained me well. I miss him.

voice.title: More About Aloy: III
voice.desc: I spent my whole life looking for my mother and never found her, not really. But I found ancient messages from the woman I was... cloned from. It felt like she knew me. And how to inspire me.

voice.title: More About Aloy: IV
voice.desc: When I grew up, I didn't have any friends. Later in my travels, I made some. But I left that world before we could grow close. That's why I'm glad to have spent time with you.

voice.title: More About Aloy: V
voice.desc: Trust doesn't come easy for me, but I know I can trust you. You're a true friend, and I don't say that often.

voice.title: Aloy's Hobbies
voice.desc: Not sure if I have a hobby, unless you count reading things from the past. So, history... I guess?

voice.title: Aloy's Troubles
voice.desc: One world needed saving. Now another. There's never time to rest.

voice.title: Favorite Food
voice.desc: I'm not picky. Anything's better than traveling on an empty stomach.

voice.title: Least Favorite Food
voice.desc: Had an Oseram stew once that was so thick you could pave a road with it. Ugh.

voice.title: Birthday
voice.desc: Never put much stock in birthdays. Where I come from, it's a time to celebrate your mother, not yourself. Even so, I wish you a, uh... happy day.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Intro
voice.desc: All right. Feels like we're making progress, but we can't stop now.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
voice.desc: Getting better. Getting stronger. Always a good thing.

voice.title: Feelings About Ascension: Climax
voice.desc: No matter how good a hunter you are, you can always get better. Never rest. Never stop learning.

voice.title: Feelings about Ascension: Conclusion
voice.desc: When we started out, you were just another stranger in a world I didn't understand. But after everything we've been through, I can say this for certain: My bow is yours, now and always.

voice.title: Elemental Skill: I
voice.desc: This'll pack a punch!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: II
voice.desc: Got something for you!

voice.title: Elemental Skill: III
voice.desc: Ever seen one of these?

voice.title: Elemental Burst: I
voice.desc: You're stuck now!

voice.title: Elemental Burst: II
voice.desc: This is a new one.

voice.title: Elemental Burst: III
voice.desc: The hunt is on!

voice.title: Deploying Wind Glider: I
voice.desc: Ha! This thing is fun!

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: I
voice.desc: These things look like they could come in handy.

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: II
voice.desc: Let's see, that looks edible... and this looks useful.

voice.title: Opening Treasure Chest: III
voice.desc: Who put all these things here?

voice.title: Low HP: I
voice.desc: This one's a fighter...

voice.title: Low HP: II
voice.desc: Come on, gotta find that weak spot...

voice.title: Low HP: III
voice.desc: I'm out of my depth...

voice.title: Fallen: I
voice.desc: I failed...

voice.title: Fallen: II
voice.desc: I'm down... I'm sorry...

voice.title: Fallen: III
voice.desc: Can't get up... It's over...

voice.title: Light Hit Taken: I
voice.desc: Ugh!

voice.title: Light Hit Taken: II
voice.desc: I got this.

voice.title: Heavy Hit Taken: I
voice.desc: Argh!

voice.title: Heavy Hit Taken: II
voice.desc: Should've known this wouldn't be easy...

voice.title: Joining Party: I
voice.desc: Where to this time?

voice.title: Joining Party: II
voice.desc: I'm Aloy. Ready for the hunt.

voice.title: Joining Party: III
voice.desc: Need help? I'm here.

value.name: Gelatina saziante
value.desc: Aloy's specialty. The cross-section looks perfect, its shape is regular, and it gives off a cool air. At first, Aloy seemed a bit apprehensive as to whether you'd enjoy this rather unique dessert, but she was relieved when you wolfed it all down in one go...

desc.text: The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.
The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.
The time has not yet come for this person's corner of the night sky to light up.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Moneta comune. La lingua compresa da tutti.

materials.name: Scheggia di giada Shivada
materials.desc: Materiale d'ascensione personaggi.

materials.name: Midollo cristallino
materials.desc: Un cristallo che contiene una scheggia di potere del Tatarigami. Aggiungere questo materiale durante la fusione aumenterà notevolmente la forza e la resistenza dei metalli.

materials.name: Guscio spettrale
materials.desc:
Un nucleo energetico che permette agli Spettri di fluttuare. Contiene una piccola quantità d'energia elementale.

La maggior parte del resto si è già dispersa.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Moneta comune. La lingua compresa da tutti.

materials.name: Frammento di giada Shivada
materials.desc:
Materiale d'ascensione dei personaggi.

"Scusa..."

materials.name: Fiore cristallino
materials.desc:
Un cristallo di ghiaccio di straordinaria purezza che si è creato nella gelida fioritura di un'Ipostasi di Cryo.
Questi cristalli gelidi continueranno a crescere secondo le loro fredde e rigide leggi, finché un giorno un fiore invernale sboccerà e congelerà tutto. Forse il tempo stagnante, quel grembo che non si scongela mai, è l'essenza di questo fiore eterno.

materials.name: Nucleo spettrale
materials.desc:
Un nucleo energetico completo che a volte può essere trovato dopo aver sconfitto gli Spettri.

C'è un dibattito in corso tra coloro che dividono il mondo solo tra vincitori e sconfitti: chi fluttua meglio, uno Spettro o un Melmoso di Anemo?

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Moneta comune. La lingua compresa da tutti.

materials.name: Gemma di giada Shivada
materials.desc:
Materiale d'ascensione dei personaggi.

"Scusa... per aver dovuto sopportare con me il dolore di tutto il mondo.

Visto che riesci a tollerare il mio freddo pungente, devi avere un desiderio che arde nel cuore?

Allora, brucia il vecchio mondo per me."

materials.name: Fiore cristallino

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 4 consecutive shots with a bow.
<color=#ffd780>Charged Attack</color>
Perform a more precise <color=#ffd780>Aimed Shot</color> with increased DMG.
While aiming, biting frost will accumulate on the arrowhead. A fully charged frost arrow will deal <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> .
<color=#ffd780>Plunging Attack</color>
Fires off a shower of arrows in mid-air before falling and striking the ground, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Moneta comune. La lingua compresa da tutti.

materials.name: Insegnamenti della libertà
materials.desc:
Materiale per l'aumento di livello dei talenti.
La libertà è lo spirito della Terra del Vento.
La libertà di vivere ne è un esempio. È la libertà di vivere apertamente e in modo sano senza preoccuparsi della propria sicurezza.

La maggior parte del resto si è già dispersa.

La libertà è lo spirito della Terra del Vento.
La libertà di viaggiare ne è un esempio. È la libertà di attraversare il mondo liberamente senza essere fermati.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Moneta comune. La lingua compresa da tutti.

materials.name: Filosofie della libertà
materials.desc:
Materiale per l'aumento di livello dei talenti.
La libertà è lo spirito della Terra del Vento.
Cantare è una di queste libertà. Cantare nella terra plasmata dall'Archon di Anemo è come lasciare che il proprio cuore voli via con il vento.

materials.name: Nucleo spettrale
materials.desc:
Un nucleo energetico completo che a volte può essere trovato dopo aver sconfitto gli Spettri.

C'è un dibattito in corso tra coloro che dividono il mondo solo tra vincitori e sconfitti: chi fluttua meglio, uno Spettro o un Melmoso di Anemo?

materials.name: Ora della fusione
materials.desc:
Un certo frammento deformato che contiene un grande potere. L'hai ottenuto sconfiggendo Signora, che ha scatenato il suo potere originale.
"Ho fatto un sogno molto lungo.
Ho sognato che ci saremmo incontrati di nuovo nel mondo puro che avevamo creato.
Ma alla fine mi sono svegliata, essendo stata consumata a lungo dalle fiamme violente, mentre tu eri tornato da tempo alla terra insieme a quel sangue avvelenato.
Ma niente di tutto ciò ha più importanza. Devo andare avanti. Devo incenerire tutto ciò che è dietro di me. Devo credere in quel puro e immacolato reame eterno di cui ha parlato... che ho visto nell'Illusione che mi ha mostrato, alla fine dell'orizzonte dei sogni di Sua Maestà."

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Moneta comune. La lingua compresa da tutti.

materials.name: Filosofie della libertà
materials.desc:
Materiale per l'aumento di livello dei talenti.
La libertà è lo spirito della Terra del Vento.

materials.name: Ora della fusione
materials.desc:
Un certo frammento deformato che contiene un grande potere. L'hai ottenuto sconfiggendo Signora, che ha scatenato il suo potere originale.
"Ho fatto un sogno molto lungo.
Ho sognato che ci saremmo incontrati di nuovo nel mondo puro che avevamo creato.
Ma alla fine mi sono svegliata, essendo stata consumata a lungo dalle fiamme violente, mentre tu eri tornato da tempo alla terra insieme a quel sangue avvelenato.
Ma niente di tutto ciò ha più importanza. Devo andare avanti. Devo incenerire tutto ciò che è dietro di me. Devo credere in quel puro e immacolato reame eterno di cui ha parlato... che ho visto nell'Illusione che mi ha mostrato, alla fine dell'orizzonte dei sogni di Sua Maestà."

materials.name: Corona della saggezza
materials.desc:
Prezioso materiale per l'aumento di livello dei talenti.

Nei tempi antichi, era un oggetto che serviva a conservare e trasmettere la conoscenza. Ora, la conoscenza si trova nei testi antichi e nelle profonde riflessioni. Tuttavia, questa Corona della saggezza è ancora in grado di trasmettere parte del suo potere e della sua conoscenza a chi la indossa.

desc.text:
Aloy throws a Freeze Bomb in the targeted direction that explodes on impact, dealing <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> . After it explodes, the Freeze Bomb will split up into many Chillwater Bomblets that explode on contact with opponents or after a short delay, dealing <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> .
When a Freeze Bomb or Chillwater Bomblet hits an opponent, the opponent's ATK is decreased and Aloy receives 1 Coil stack.
Aloy can gain up to 1 Coil stack every 0.1s.
<color=#ffd780>Coil</color>
·Each stack increases Aloy's Normal Attack DMG.
·When Aloy has 4 Coil stacks, all stacks of Coil are cleared. She then enters the Rushing Ice state, which further increases the DMG dealt by her Normal Attacks and converts her Normal Attack DMG to <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG</color> .
While in the Rushing Ice state, Aloy cannot obtain new Coil stacks.
Coil effects will be cleared 30s after Aloy leaves the field.
You think that's cold? Guess you've never been to The Cut.

attributes.key: Rushing Ice Normal Attack DMG Bonus

desc.text:
Aloy throws a Power Cell filled with Cryo in the targeted direction, then detonates it with an arrow, dealing <color=#99ffff>AoE Cryo DMG</color> .
Whether "Zero Dawn" referred to hope or extinction no longer matters. Aloy has already saved her world, and the fate of this one is still being forged by its own heroes.
When Aloy receives the Coil effect from <color=#ffd780>Frozen Wilds</color> , her ATK is increased by 16%, while nearby party members' ATK is increased by 8%. This effect lasts 10s.

When Aloy is in the Rushing Ice state conferred by <color=#ffd780>Frozen Wilds</color> , her <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG Bonus</color> increases by 3.5% every 1s. A maximum <color=#99ffff>Cryo DMG Bonus</color> increase of 35% can be gained in this way.
When Aloy is in the party, animals who produce Fowl, Raw Meat, or Chilled Meat will not be startled when party members approach them.
